author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

Following the discussion in the [AlCaDB meeting on 28 Sep](https://indico.cern.ch/event/959393/) this PR contains implementation of the "relative" alignment of PPS. Integration of the "global" part is foreseen soon.

For more details please refer to the README file in "CalibPPS/AlignmentRelative".

#### PR validation:

Various tests are included in the test directory.
title: PPS: relative alignment
